mapper.select: select bo.no no, bo.title title, bo.content content, bo.hit hit, to_char(bo.reg_date, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI') regDate, bo.user_no userNo from board bo, users us where bo.user_no=us.no order by no desc

select rt.rn, rt.no, rt.title, rt.content, rt.hit, rt.regDate, rt.userNo, rt.name from (select rownum rn, ot.no, ot.title, ot.content, ot.hit, ot.regDate, ot.userNo, ot.name from (select bo.no, bo.title, bo.content, bo.hit, to_char(bo.reg_date, 'YY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') regDate, bo.user_no userNo, us.name name from board bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no order by bo.no desc) ot )rt where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
